--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "anupama" <anupama@n...> wrote:
> hi,
> 
>   can we place our source code and the testcase code in one directory.

I assume you mean "same package".

If you wish.  Many people do.  I don't though... I put tests in a
subpackage.  Some people laugh at me for doing that but it works for
me... and keeps me honest by only letting me test public behaviour.

Another issue (orthogonal) is whether they are in fact in the same
source tree.  It all depends on how decoupled logically & physically
you want/need them.

> And one more question where are the source codes for the samples >
testcases SimpleTest, AllTests and Vector Classes.

In the unpacked distribution, look in junit/samples and junit/tests

Dave
